title: RANKED COMPLAINS
body:
just wanna rant about some stuff.

so yeah.

I swear if rito doesn't give oce "solo" q's i will blast my balls. (not literally)
ranked q's waiting time is equivalent to a brain surgery. (12hrs)

The team matchup is still** cancer-** _cant use that word :/_ bad.
well i hope you enjoyed my rant.
k bye.{{summoner:4}}

replies.body:
a.  You can queue solo 
b.  If you don't want to wait so long play normals or pick a less popular role and broaden your horizon 
c.  At least people are now getting what they want and there is a higher chance of people playing what they're good at but don't forget it's still League of     Legends.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

> [{quoted}](name=Bunny,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=iafAVAJV,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-02-23T01:45:47.436+0000)
>
> a.  You can queue solo 
> b.  If you don't want to wait so long play normals or pick a less popular role and broaden your horizon 
> c.  At least people are now getting what they want and there is a higher chance of people playing what they're good at but don't forget it's still League of     Legends.
> 
> {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

He means SOLO solo q, the q where you don't have the chance of being the oddone out in a 4man premade :/
Even if you do get up against 4 man pre made if you don't have a 4 man pre made on your team they will give you higher mmr people on your team. It's still balanced.

> [{quoted}](name=Bunny,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=iafAVAJV,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2016-02-24T09:29:59.050+0000)
>
> Even if you do get up against 4 man pre made if you don't have a 4 man pre made on your team they will give you higher mmr people on your team. It's still balanced.

That isn't balanced though. Even if your team gets better players, you're still 5 strangers vsing 4 people who should have excellent communication and 1 person who can just tag along. I don't really care if someone's alone with a group of 4 as long as they don't all pick on the one person, but communication is better than raw skill.
